The '''Mystery series''' is a series of loosely connected novels based on mysteries in the [[Forgotten Realms]] and [[Wikipedia:Dragonlance|Dragonlance]] universes.

# ''[[Murder in Cormyr]]'' (A Forgotten Realms Mystery) by [[Chet Williamson]]  
# ''[http://www.amazon.com/Murder-Tarsis-Classics-Maddox-Roberts-ebook/dp/B00A5MRB6E/ Murder in Tarsis]'' (A Dragonlance Mystery) by [[Wikipedia:John_Maddox_Roberts|John Maddox Roberts]]
# ''[[Murder in Halruaa]]'' (A Forgotten Realms Mystery) by [[Richard Meyers]]
